help.info: A gateway function to MPQP solver (without errorchecks)
help.descr:
The function call to MPQP solver from Opt class.
Using option settings for MPQP solver taken from MPT2.6.

field.name: H
field.descr: Quadratic part of the objective function.

field.name: f
field.descr: Linear part of the objective function.

field.name: pF
field.descr: Linear part of the objective function for parameters.

field.name: A
field.descr: Linear part of the inequality constraints Ax \le b + B\theta.

field.name: b
field.descr: Right hand side of the inequality constraints Ax \le b + B\theta.

field.name: pB
field.descr: Right hand side of the inequality constraints for parameters Ax \le b + B\theta.

field.name: Ae
field.descr: Linear part of the equality constraints {A}_{e}x=b_{e} + E\theta .

field.name: be
field.descr: Right hand side of the equality constraints {A}_{e}x=b_{e} + E\theta .

field.name: pE
field.descr: Right hand side of the equality constraints for parameters {A}_{e}x=b_{e} + E\theta .

field.name: lb
field.descr: Lower bound for the decision variables x \ge \text{lb}.

field.name: ub
field.descr: Upper bound for the decision variables x \le \text{ub}.

field.name: Ath
field.descr: Linear part of the inequality constraints A_{\theta}\theta \le b_{\theta}.

field.name: bth
field.descr: Right hand side of the inequality constraints A_{\theta}\theta \le b_{\theta}.

field.name: M
field.descr: Linear matrix involved in LCP.

field.name: q
field.descr: Right hand side vector involved in LCP.

field.name: Q
field.descr: Linear matrix involved in parametric formulation of LCP.

field.name: n
field.descr: Number of decision variables.

field.name: d
field.descr: Number of parameters.

field.name: m
field.descr: Number of inequalities in Ax \le b + B\theta.

field.name: me
field.descr: Number of equalities in A_{e}x=b_{e} + E\theta.

field.name: problem_type
field.descr: A string specifying the problem to be solved

field.name: varOrder
field.descr: Order of variables if the problem was processed by YALMIP first.

field.name: Internal
field.descr: Internal property of Opt class.

field.name: recover
field.descr: Affine map for MPQP problems if there were any equalities present and have been removed by eliminateEquations method.

field.name: Y
field.descr: Matrix of the affine map x = \text{Y}y + \text{th}\begin{pmatrix} \theta \\ 1 \end{pmatrix} . The map is from the optimization variables involed in the reduced MPQP y(\theta) \mapsto x to the original MPQP.

field.name: th
field.descr: Matrix of the affine map x = \text{Y}y + \text{th}\begin{pmatrix} \theta \\ 1 \end{pmatrix} . The map is from the optimization variables involed in the reduced MPQP y(\theta) \mapsto x to the original MPQP.

field.name: xopt
field.descr: Optimal solution

field.name: mpqpsol
field.descr: Structure with the solution as returned by MPQP solver.

field.name: Pn
field.descr: Array of polytopes in MPT2 format.

field.name: Fi
field.descr: Cell array of matrices of the control law given as x=F_{i}\theta + G_{i}.

field.name: Gi
field.descr: Cell array of matrices of the control law given as x=F_{i}\theta + G_{i}.

field.name: activeConstraints
field.descr: Index set of active constraints

field.name: Phard
field.descr: Feasible domain.

field.name: details
field.descr: More details about the solution and the computation.
